title: Chinese chip designer Montage Technology soars over 60% in Hong Kong debut
summary_full: Shares of Chinese chip designer Montage Technology surged 60% in its Hong Kong trading debut on Monday following an initial share sale that raised $902 million.
summary_public: Shares of Chinese chip designer Montage Technology surged 60% in its Hong Kong trading debut on Monday following an initial share sale that raised $902 million.
